verbs.description: idaho spudnuts [V: raising] [ARG1: eight children] [ARGM-LOC: on a potato farm in idaho] mother was very creative at using an abundant crop we especially liked her light fluffy potato doughnuts we encouraged mother to let us help make them often now i prepare them to share with friends and neighbors -sandi jones windsor california
